column1: Smoque BBQ////Hubs and I made it here an hour before closing time last Thursday.  It still was pretty busy.  Everyone was super friendly which eminded me of some BBQ joints back home in NC.  Someone near the front will seat you after you order.  Of note
column2: if you want to eat outside
column3: you have to finish up right at closing time
column5: you can stay longer if you want.
